statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{25 \, x^{3} - 9 \, x^{2} + 10 \, x - 4 , -5 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x + 2 , -5 \, x^{3} - 3 \, x^{2} - 2 \, x - 1 , 5 \, x^{3} - 13 \, x^{2} + 2 \, x - 5 , -3 \, x^{3} + 5 \, x^{2} - 5 \, x - 1\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
